mapper.select: SELECT book_id AS bookId, title, author FROM book ORDER BY book_id
SELECT book_id AS bookId, title, author, publisher, release_date AS releaseDate, isbn FROM book WHERE book_id = #{bookId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(book_id, title, author, publisher, release_date, isbn) VALUES(#{bookId},#{title},#{author},#{publisher},#{releaseDate},#{isbn})
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET title=#{title}, author=#{author}, publisher=#{publisher}, release_date=#{releaseDate}, isbn=#{isbn} WHERE book_id = #{bookId}
